title: Rugs.com Boston Collection Rug – 8 Ft Runner Blue Low-Pile Rug Perfect for Hallways, Entryways
features: Designed to withstand everyday wear, this runner rug is the perfect size and shape for hallways, entryways, or anywhere you want to bring a little more style into your home.
This blue rug projects calm, cool, and sophistication. Balance the color it with warm hues for a relaxed look.
Soothing colors and traditional designs give the Boston Collection a stately look.

Low-pile rugs tend to be easy to clean and very durable. They're the best choice for high-traffic areas like hallways, living rooms, and dining rooms where they let chairs slide easily. This rug is kid and pet-friendly.

Made with a soft and durable synthetic material blend, the textured pile adds visual interest and while standing up to the toughest abuse. This rug does not have a non-slip backing. Rug pad not included but highly recommended.
description: Bring home sophisticated style. With calm neutral colors and traditional floral patterns, the Boston Collection creates a subdued atmosphere in any room it’s in. Tribal medallions and all-over botanical designs are framed by stately borders for an up-scale look. Cool blues and warm grays and ivories give these rugs a soothing touch. The medium-height 1/3" synthetic blend pile is soft underfoot and easy to clean, making it perfect for medium to low traffic areas that need a little more stately style like living rooms, bedrooms, or offices.
